definition: a marriage predestined in a former life (idiom)

sentences.english: At the wedding reception, the bride or groom greet theirs guests.
sentences.chinese: 在姻緣喜宴上，新娘和新郎向賓客表達歡迎。

sentences.english: A good marriage would be between a blind wife and a deaf husband.
sentences.chinese: 盲目的妻子和耳聾的丈夫纔會締結好姻緣。

sentences.english: After 30 seasons, he dumped his wife.
sentences.chinese: 他在姻緣30年後，甩掉了他的妻子。

sentences.english: To enjoy the joy along with singlehood, or to expect the romanticism brought by possible marriage.
sentences.chinese: 享受不婚，也享受你可能遇上的姻緣。

sentences.english: Don't let suspicion louse up a good marriage.
sentences.chinese: 不要讓猜忌毀了一段好姻緣。

sentences.english: Her heart is unwilling, originally should be a nice chance, but be arrested along the curtate sword.
sentences.chinese: 她心有不甘啊，本該是段美好姻緣，卻被人橫刀奪走。

sentences.english: Thee Chinese people refer to a good relationship as "a bond of gold and jade."
sentences.chinese: 中國人將美好的姻緣稱爲“金玉良緣”。

sentences.english: They were blessed for their happy marriage.
sentences.chinese: 人們爲他們的美好姻緣祝福。

sentences.english: Stephanie dreams of an Amelia-type marriage day and night.
sentences.chinese: 斯蒂芬尼夙夜企盼着一段鸞鳳和鳴的姻緣。

sentences.english: There is a saying in Chinese that marriages are made in heaven and prepared on the moon.
sentences.chinese: 在中國有一種說法，叫做“姻緣天註定”。

sentences.english: Awakening Marriage is a novel with about 100 chapters at the end of Ming Dynasty and at the beginning of Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 《醒世姻緣傳》是明末清初百回長篇白話世情小說。

sentences.english: It was the beginning of a beautiful relationship.
sentences.chinese: 一段美滿的姻緣從此開始了。

sentences.english: Ywe wonderful article on marriage were certainly an eye opener to a lot yawayhsters.
sentences.chinese: 你那篇有關姻緣的好文書，使許多年輕人獲得啓示。

sentences.english: Self-delusion about one's own attractiveness is a prerequisite to every happy marriage.
sentences.chinese: 自作多情是每一段美好姻緣的必要前提。

sentences.english: Flowers and fruit, a happy marriage on a string.
sentences.chinese: 花好月圓得正果，美滿姻緣一線牽。

sentences.english: At the wedding reception, the bride and groom greet theirs guests.
sentences.chinese: 在姻緣喜宴上，新娘和新郎向賓客表達歡迎。

definition: fate or chance that brings people together/predestined affinity or relationship/(Budd.) destiny
(of a couple) to be harmonious/to be each other's sunshine
to foreordain/to be bound to/to be destined to/to be doomed to/inevitably
chance/opportunity/predestined relationship/(Buddhist) principal and secondary causes/chain of cause and effect
all one's hopes and efforts come to nothing/futile
luck with the ladies/a romance/good luck
to straighten out/to explain/to ease sb's anxiety
